entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
